name: Uproot (itch) (GoncaloGoulao, Diogo Mendonça, Renas, Diogo Valdrez, Legoindie)
name_original: Uproot (itch) (GoncaloGoulao, Diogo Mendonça, Renas, Diogo Valdrez, Legoindie)
description:
Uproot

This is Uproot, a game about roots...  

In this game we explore the concept of cultural roots, and what happens when you destroy them.

Take in our background, a collection of portuguese places and landmarks... and cherish it, it may not last...

How to play:
  • WASD: move your character
  • Space-bar: jump
  • x2 Space-bar: double jump
  • Left-click: shoot
  • Right-click: hit
The team:

This game was developed in 48 hours for the Global Game Jam 2023, the theme of which was "Roots".

  • Diogo Mendonça - Programming
  • Diogo Valdrez - Programming
  • Gonçalo Goulão - Art
  • Renata Candeias - Art
  • Aidan Coutts - Music
